description: This recipe is meant as a rough guideline for making your own personal ranch dressing. I rarely measure and just add seasonings to taste. Start with the amounts listed and add more as needed. You can give it your own flair by adding other seasonings, such as dill weed, celery seed, or red pepper. Just start small because once you add it, you canâ€™t take it out!
name: Hidden Cashew Ranch Dressing
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup raw cashews (see note about soaking)
1 1/4 cup plain, unsweetened non-dairy milk ( (I used Westsoy)
1-2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice (more if using Meyer lemons)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients except parsley and chives into blender and process on high until smooth. Add parsley and chives and blend on low briefly to incorporate them. Check seasonings and add more as needed, but remember that the flavor will get stronger over time. Refrigerate for at least an hour to allow flavors to blend. Stir or shake before serving.
